1L3.F.summary: Lifco AB (publ) engages in the dental, demolition and tools, and systems solutions businesses. It is involved in the wholesale of dental equipment, such as disinfectants, saliva ejectors, bite registration and dental impression materials, bonding agents, and other consumables, as well as develops and sells medical record systems. The company also develops, manufactures, and sells demolition robots, and crane and excavator attachments to crane, excavator and other heavy machine manufacturers. In addition, it engages in the contract manufacturing of electronic components, stainless steel products, and galvanized products for use in the security and alarm, industrial applications, telecom and IT, food products, and pharmaceutical industries; and the waste handling and recycling of tires, wires, refrigerators, aluminum products, and electronics. Further, the company offers vehicle racking systems and accessories for service vans; equipment for sawing and handling of sawn lumber; and cleaning and sealing of pipes, as well as electrical supplies, and LED-lighting and measuring instruments for the surveying and construction industries. Additionally, it is involved in the wholesale of machinery and equipment for electrical installations and electricity production. It operates in Sweden, Norway, Germany, rest of Europe, North America, Asia, Australia, and internationally. The company was founded in 1946 and is based in EnkÃ¶ping, Sweden. Lifco AB (publ) is a subsidiary of Carl Bennet AB.

MIDW-A.ST.summary: Midway Holding AB (publ) operates as a conglomerate of small and medium enterprises in Sweden and rest of Nordic countries. The company operates in two segments, Technology Companies and Trading Companies. It sells new and used cars, spare parts, and accessories; and rents cars, as well as offers workshop services. The company also develops, produces, and markets equipment for converting plastic materials to rolled products; operates as a subcontractor; and offers customized system solutions. In addition, it imports and sells grinding and construction machines, lifting equipment, material handling equipment, air purifiers, industrial vacuums, and twister cleaning systems and lasers to construction industry. The company was founded in 1989 and is headquartered in MalmÃ¶, Sweden.

In addition, it imports and sells grinding and construction machines, lifting equipment, material handling equipment, air purifiers, industrial vacuums, and twister cleaning systems and lasers to construction industry. The company was founded in 1989 and is headquartered in MalmÃ¶, Sweden.

NBFB.F.summary: Nolato AB (publ) develops, manufactures, and sells plastic, silicone, and thermoplastic elastomer products for medical technology, pharmaceutical, consumer electronics, telecom, automotive, and other industrial sectors. Its Medical Solutions segment offers inhalers and check valves for asthma, insulin pens and infusion sets for diabetes, seals and earpieces for hearing aids, seals for pacemakers and cardiac anchors for heart rhythm treatment, seals and connectors for dialysis, catheter balloons and uridomes for urology, catheter balloons and complete blood purification equipment for surgery, and allergy and pregnancy tests for diagnostics; and plastic packaging solutions for pharmaceuticals and dietary supplements. The company's Integrated Solutions segment provides subsystems for vaporiser heating products, mobile phones, and home electronics products, such as injection molded, painted, and decorated components; and adhesive-based components with mechanical and/or cosmetic functions comprising logos, speaker grilles, and three-dimensional design elements. This segment also offers process and material solutions for shielding electronics for electromagnetic compatibility and heat dissipation for electronics. Its Industrial Solutions segment provides engine components, gaskets for engines and exhaust systems, interior details, battery casings, and other products for use in the automotive industry; components for microwave ovens, components for strimmers and chainsaws, flushing mechanisms for toilets, and brew units for coffee machines; and ball retainers and storage seals for ball bearings, armrests, etc. for office chairs and fireproof cable ducts. Nolato AB (publ) operates in Sweden and the other Nordic countries, and rest of Europe; and North America, Asia, etc. The company was formerly known as Nordiska Latexfabriken i Torekov AB and changed its name to Nolato AB (publ) in 1982. Nolato AB (publ) was founded in 1938 and is headquartered in Torekov, Sweden.

VOLO-PREF.ST.summary: Volati AB is an industrial investment group, specializing in buyouts, add on acquisitions in mature and middle market companies. The group invests primarily in Trading, Consumer and Industry sectors. Within trading it invests in building materials sector, consumables and material for construction, home and garden, and agriculture and forestry farmers. Within consumer, it invest in database marketing, digitization and e-commerce. Within industry it invest in international expansion, lean manufacturing and HR. It prefers to invest in small to medium sized Nordic, European, companies mainly in Sweden. The firm invests between SEK 10 million ($1.09 million) and SEK 200 million ($21.94million) in companies with enterprise values between SEK 50 million ($5.48 million) and SEK 1000 million ($109.71 million), revenues between SEK 25 million ($2.74 million) and SEK 500 million ($54.85 million), net operating income exceeding SEK5 million ($ 0.55 million), and EBITDA between SEK20 million ($2.19 million) and SEK 200million ($21.94 million). It seeks majority/ownership control and prefers to invest in companies with strong cash flows and take a board seat in its portfolio companies. The firm invests out of balance sheet. Volati AB was founded in 2003 and is based in Stockholm, Sweden with additional offices across Europe.
